title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Maximize ROI: How Octus migrated CreditAI from Azure to Amazon Bedrock (SMB305)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 最大化投资回报率:Octus 如何将 CreditAI 从 Azure 迁移到 Amazon Bedrock (SMB305)
abstract: This session reveals how Octus migrated CreditAI to Amazon Bedrock. We will detail Octus' journey from managing multiple cloud providers and costly GPU instances to implementing a streamlined architecture using Amazon Bedrock, AWS Fargate, and Amazon OpenSearch. Learn how Octus achieved zero downtime while reducing costs, improving scalability to handle millions of documents, and enhancing response quality. Discover practical strategies for consolidating AI operations and leveraging AWS to deliver powerful, conversational intelligence at enterprise scale.
abstract_cn: 本次会议展示了 Octus 如何将 CreditAI 迁移到 Amazon Bedrock。我们将详细介绍 Octus 从管理多个云服务提供商和昂贵的 GPU 实例，到使用 Amazon Bedrock、AWS Fargate 和 Amazon OpenSearch 实现精简架构的历程。了解 Octus 如何在实现零停机的同时降低成本、提升可扩展性以处理数百万份文档，并增强响应质量。探索整合 AI 运营的实用策略，以及如何利用 AWS 在企业规模上提供强大的对话式智能。
